content.title: About PMC
content.subtitle: Your trusted enterprise project management partner
content.story: PMC has been at the forefront of enterprise project management solutions for over a decade. We serve Fortune 500 companies and innovative startups alike.

content.title: Frequently Asked Questions
content.subtitle: Everything you need to know about PMC's enterprise solutions

items.question: How scalable is PMC for large enterprises?
items.answer: PMC is designed for enterprise scale, supporting unlimited projects, users, and resources. Our cloud infrastructure can handle millions of tasks and provides 99.9% uptime SLA.

items.question: Can PMC integrate with our existing systems?
items.answer: Yes, PMC offers seamless integration with ERP, CRM, HR systems, and over 100+ enterprise applications through APIs and pre-built connectors.

items.question: What kind of support do you provide?
items.answer: We offer 24/7 enterprise support with dedicated account managers, priority response times, and comprehensive training programs for your teams.

items.question: Is PMC compliant with industry standards?
items.answer: Absolutely. PMC is SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, and meets ISO 27001 security standards for enterprise data protection.

items.question: Can we customize PMC for our specific needs?
items.answer: Yes, PMC offers extensive customization options, workflows, and reporting capabilities tailored to your organization's unique requirements.
